item.description:
Our book for December will be John Irving's "A Prayer for Owen Meany". We weren't going to meet but, since this is my last month as facilitator, I wanted to suggest one of my all time favorite books as a parting gift. I promise that you will never forget Owen and you'll thank me for the suggestion to read it!

Please note that the meeting is happening one week earlier than usual as many people will be away the last week of the month.

We read "The Scent of Rain and Lightning" by Nancy Pickard and I will admit that it was roundly panned. Even I didn't like it and I recommended it!

Enjoy all the season has in store for you. Find time to curl up with a good book and, hopefully, we'll all meet in December at Bruegger's.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: The Brookline Book Club
